item.name: Company API

request.description: Gives all the low-stock alerts for all the warehouses managed by the company.

item.description: The `Company API` folder manages company records and monitors stock levels, providing endpoints to create, read, and track companies and their inventory alerts.

item.name: Supplier API

body.raw:
{
    "id": "sup002",
    "name": "Global Traders Ltd",
    "address": "123 Business Park, Andheri, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India",
    "contactNo": "9876543210",
    "registeredEmail": "contact@globaltraders.com"
  }

request.description: Returns the list of all the suppliers.
Returns the supplier by Id if not found sends 404 - Not Found.

item.description: The `Supplier API` folder manages supplier APIs such as creating and getting all the supplier.

item.name: Warehouse
item.description: Handles APIs related to creation and retrival of warehouse.

item.name: Products API

item.name: Inventory

request.description: Returns all the products in a warehouse.

item.description: Manages all the APIs related to Inventory.
